verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) Out of the <S%H4615>depths<s%> I have <S%H7121>cried<s%> to Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice!<s%> Let Thine <S%H241>ears<s%> be <S%H9533>attentive<s%> To the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications.<s%>
But there is <S%H5547>forgiveness<s%> with Thee, That Thou mayest be <S%H3372>feared.<s%>
I <S%H6960>wait<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> does <S%H6960>wait,<s%> And in His <S%H1697>word<s%> do I <S%H3176>hope.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> [waits] for the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H4480>More<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> for the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> [Indeed, more than] the <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> for the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3176>hope<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> For with the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> there is <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> And with Him is <S%H7235>abundant<s%> <S%H6304>redemption.<s%>
